materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5l3am","text":"Luminescence-based ADP detection assay (ADP Glo Max assay; Promega)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62cld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajjq","text":"Reaction Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fljgb","text":"50 mM MOPS-KOH pH 7.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aej44","text":"100 mM KCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj3vr","text":"11 mM MgCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4paa4","text":"1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kvn7","text":"0.02% DDM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fdsu","text":"0.001-10 mM spermine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5dh81","text":"Use 1 μg microsomes per reaction (1 µL of 5 mg/mL stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6lnru","text":"Dilute to 4 µL in Reaction Buffer at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emkii","text":"Equilibrate microsomes in reaction buffer for     and for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7c089","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"3AB6C940057A11ED8F3BE58A5BD1FEB5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4562B840057A11ED8F3BE58A5BD1FEB5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3F090C60057A11ED8F3BE58A5BD1FEB5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"42FE6270057A11ED8F3BE58A5BD1FEB5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aoohv","text":"Add 1 µL of 25 mM ATP (final concentration 5 mM ATP) to start reaction (total reaction volume 5 µL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
